title: 518D.306 ENFORCEMENT OF REGISTERED DETERMINATION.
text:
(a) A court of this state may grant any relief normally available under the law of this state to enforce a registered child custody determination made by a court of another state.
(b) A court of this state shall recognize and enforce, but may not modify, except in accordance with sections 518D.201 to 518D.210, a registered child custody determination of a court of another state.
